law.catch_line: Payment of funds collected under KRS 304.4-010 into State Treasury.
law.text: The commissioner shall promptly pay into the State Treasury all fees, licenses, and charges collected under the provisions of KRS 304.4-010.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 989, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 2, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 4, sec. 2, effective June 18, 1970.
